channel.title: Adult Content Section
channel.description:
[b][size=18pt][color=red]For all you trollsacks flappin meh cheecks i don't support this or think its a good idea at all, if you don't believe me ask tyb97 i discussed this with him before i even make this thread. I just thought it'd be funny and a fun discussion. [/b]
So after a discussion on this thread (Warning NSFW): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/ :)index.php/topic,521976.0.html
David informed me that Adult Content (aka porn) wasn't against the rules here on MITB. However he had also said
[quote="Davidi2, post:80, topic:419429"]Rule 6: We don't post misleading links, put appropriate warnings(while there's no specific rules on adult content, if you don't use Not Safe For Work(NSFW) warnings, you will be punished).
[b]I think I'm going to try to get that changed for MPSC though, because the userbase here does tend to be younger, and there are country laws about being an adult before you can look at that stuff.[/b][/quote]
So as I as i do agree on a great basis with him that most of us here at mopar are little 12 years old. I myself am only 16 and where I live (USA) the legal age to view adult content is 18. However im aware in some countries its 21. [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legal_status_of_Internet_pornography#United_States][i]Read more here...[/i][/url] I believe its a bit extreme to rid of all adult content together. I would think that strict rules, monitoring, and limitations would be appropriate.
So i believe the best way to describe this is with picture, so heres it dumbed down for ya.
[b]Moparscape: [/b] [IMG]http://t2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR32BjrWqOSC_GxSE1tOQgOHIzcifVjRdlarQeDSQ0FyztEByjbxw[/img]
[b]RuneServer:[/b] [IMG]http://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS1HpnzTMT7-NLbfW58favHtMD-pOonQcpnYr5fvUr0AfmO9hdf[/img]
As you can see most of us here are young-ens. So basically most of us here wont be even allowed to view this section but i do believe its a bit of a downer and unnecessary to exile it all together. So please vote in the poll above.
Do you think we should have a Section/Child Board dedicated to Adult Content?
Also as an added bonus Reyx7 has a huge porno pack of 68mb of really hot chicks naked. So ermm yeah 40-60% of em are scene.
And since this is not yet against the rules, Download it here: http://www.mediafire.com/?d0p800k8z6v0pkz (This is all from reyx7 none of this is mine, enjoy ;D)

item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Davidi2:

Next one to post/quote NSFW pictures in here gets a week ban…

You know, it’s not against the rules unless there’s a warning, and there is a warning, meaning we can’t get in trouble. And I’ve PMed mitb multiple times about moderators posting NSFW and that he’s favoring them because he’s friends with them, and he didn’t do shit.
